about.about_long: Floating in the digital realm, I build with React, TypeScript, and modern web tools. My style blends minimalist design with efficient, high-performance code. I see every user interaction as a chance to create something simple, elegant, and impactful. I’m passionate about crafting seamless experiences that feel natural and intuitive, solving complex challenges with clean solutions. For me, great web development is where beauty meets purpose.
about.about_short: I’m a multidisciplinary developer who enjoys building interfaces that are both useful and good to look at. I like working where design meets code, turning ideas into clean, interactive experiences.
about.tagline: Crafting clean, interactive web experiences with React and modern frontend magic. Let’s build something that looks great and works even better.
